text: Choose a Thursday, Friday or Sunday to qualify for our event specials.

modalDetail.title: Our Social Event Specials
modalDetail.description:
Thursday’s the new Friday
Party like it’s Friday on a Thursday. Enjoy a buy one get one free appetizer special for all social events on Thursday nights! 
 
Chiavari Friday’s
Take a load off with Chiavari chairs on us. Free Chiavari Friday’s for all social events! 
 
Sunday Funday
Start your event anytime you want. It’s Sunday Funday!!!
